title: Eleven Madison Park: The Cookbook
description: Eleven Madison Park is one of New York City's preeminent fine-dining establishments, where Chef Daniel Humm marries the latest culinary techniques with classical technique.Under Chef Humm’s leadership, the restaurant has soared to new heights and has become one of the premier dining destinations in the world.  Eleven Madison The Cookbook  is a sumptuous tribute to the unforgettable experience of dining in the restaurant. The book features more than 125 sophisticated recipes, arranged by season, adapted for the home cook, and accompanied by stunning full-color photographs by Francesco Tonelli.
author: Daniel Humm
